description.en:
A misunderstanding during an audition for a talent show 5 years ago made Ho Su hate Won very much. But bad luck for Ho Su, it turns out that he actually has to ask Won for help in order to become famous. Can Won and Ho Su solve their problems?

___

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Musuh-Jadi-Cinta/3027)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/amour-amer)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4514897)
description.fr:
Sun Woowon est le leader d’un des groupes de K-pop les plus populaires du moment. Il a tout pour lui : un visage d’ange, un corps d’Apollon, et un talent inégalable pour faire le show. Et côté cœur ? Depuis cinq ans, il est secrètement amoureux de Joo Hosu, une chanteuse qui travaille dans la même agence que lui, mais qui est loin de connaître le succès. Seul bémol : Joo Hosu le déteste ! Car la jeune artiste garde un très mauvais souvenir de ce qui s’est passé avec Won cinq ans plus tôt… Alors, quand la directrice de l’agence demande à Hosu de se rapprocher du beau chanteur pour améliorer son image et sa carrière, c’est le début d’une relation pas comme les autres ! Leur amour sera-t-il sans fausses notes ? 

___

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Musuh-Jadi-Cinta/3027)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/amour-amer)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4514897)
description.id:
Kesalahpahaman saat audisi ajang pencarian bakat 5 tahun lalu membuat Ho Su sangat membenci Won. Namun sial bagi Ho Su, ternyata dia malah harus meminta bantuan Won agar dapat terkenal. Mampukah Won dan Ho Su menyelesaikan masalah mereka? Bagaimanakah kelanjutan hubungan mereka?

___

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Musuh-Jadi-Cinta/3027)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/amour-amer)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4514897)
description.ko:
얼굴, 몸매, 실력 거기다 인성까지 모두 다 톱인, 대한민국 최고 아이돌 ONE의 메인보컬 '선우원'. 
그런 그는 같은 소속사의 잘 안 나가는 싱어송라이터 ‘주호수’를 5년째 남몰래 짝사랑하는 중이다. 
하지만 호수는 5년 전 선우원과의 악연으로 전국민이 선우원을 좋아할 때 나 홀로 '선우원 타도!'를 
(속으로)외치고 다닌다. 그런 어느 날 호수는 소속사 사장님의 명으로 선우원과 친해지라는 미션을 받게 되고, 
그 뒤 두 사람의 어마어마한 밀당연애가 시작되는데!

___

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Musuh-Jadi-Cinta/3027)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.verytoon.com/serie/amour-amer)

---

- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4514897)
